original_text: Illness may completely destroy my skin. But after that happens, I know that in this body I will see God. Illness may completely destroy my skin. But after that happens, I know that in this body I will see God. Illness may completely destroy my skin. But after that happens, I know that in this body I will see God. Illness may completely destroy my skin.
korean_text: 내 가죽이 벗김을 당한 뒤에도 내가 육체 밖에서 하나님을 보리라

sentences.original_text: Illness may completely destroy my skin.
sentences.korean_translation: 질병이 내 피부를 완전히 파괴할 수도 있다.

sentences.original_text: I know that in this body
Illness may completely destroy my skin.
